profile.name: Yukihiro "Matz" Matsumoto
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Ruby Association, NaCl
profile.summary: Highly experienced software engineer with a passion for Ruby development and embedded systems. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects on time.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of a process module for mruby and a prototype of stream-based programming language.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality projects on time.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained various open-source projects, including lock-free queue implementations.
Provided expert advice to clients on embedded systems development.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including keyboard controller firmware for Atmel AVR and ARM USB families.
Contributed to the development of a lightweight Ruby implementation.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained various open-source projects, including a mini mruby compiler integrated with mruby/c VM for one-chip microcontroller.
Provided expert advice to clients on embedded systems development.

experience.title: C Programmer
description: Developed and maintained various C-based projects, including a lightweight Ruby implementation.
Contributed to the development of keyboard controller firmware for Atmel AVR and ARM USB families.
